verses.name: 1 Samuel 8:9
verses.text: Now therefore hearken unto their voice: howbeit yet protest solemnly unto them, and shew them the manner of the king that shall reign over them.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 8:10
verses.text: And Samuel told all the words of the Lord unto the people that asked of him a king.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 8:11
verses.text: And he said, This will be the manner of the king that shall reign over you: He will take your sons, and appoint them for himself, for his chariots, and to be his horsemen; and some shall run before his chariots.
